DOC.brief_title: Development Gourmet Healthy Cooking Workshop Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign dietary consultation-only control group gourmet medical cooking workshop . The workshop consist 6 lesson follow lesson : introduction , caloric density food , fat , vegetable fruit , Whole grain legume , Healthy desserts . All lesson start half hour theoretical introduction , follow 2.5 hour `` hand '' session supervision medical chef . The study population include woman receive adjuvant chemotherapy breast cancer . 72 patient recruit randomly divide two group : intervention group 36 commence workshop 2007 control group 36 take part dietitian consulting session .
